[[inst_hl_shp]]
==== HL.SHP

*Syntax:* hl.shp SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<1]

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_shp.svg[HL.SHP encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* STA/PAIR

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "PAIR", "agu_kind": "STA", "note": "User confirmed all stores are AGU/STA + STD", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["AGU", "STD"], "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
